itunes:summary:
Weary parents, take a much deserved break and listen in! Daystar founder and Raising Boys and Girls leader, Melissa Trevathan, wraps up season 4 with a message of hope for parents in the trenches.

Grab episode show notes HERE.

Connect with Raising Boys and Girls HERE.

Learn more about Minno HERE.

We've got some big changes coming for Season 5. We can't wait to share more with you next month!! Stay tuned.
